title: Replace convert.cpg wordmark image with uploaded brand logo

requirements.text: Add the user-uploaded brand logo (from "CCPG logo Transparent BG.png") as a static image asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and use it as the primary hero logo in place of the current convert.cpg wordmark image.

quotes: Please change the conver.cpg image to my brand logo image that I attached.

acceptanceCriteria: A new logo image file exists under frontend/public/assets/generated with a stable filename.
HeroSection renders the uploaded brand logo instead of "/assets/generated/convert-cpg-wordmark.dim_512x128.png".
The hero logo displays correctly on light and dark backgrounds (transparent background preserved).

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep all changes within the existing single-page landing page; do not introduce new sections or flows.
nonGoals: Creating or modifying backend canister logic.
Changing carousel timing or other unrelated landing page content.

required: Transparent brand logo centered with even padding (ccpg-logo-transparent.dim_512x128.png)
